Title: Establishes a crisis intervention team program
Summary: Establishes a crisis intervention team training demonstration program; establishes a crisis intervention team training program advisory committee and crisis intervention team training fund.
LawCode: Add §§7.51, 7.53 & 7.55, amd §19.07, Ment Hyg L; add §99-qq, St Fin L; add §209-h, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, the state finance law and the general municipal law, in relation to establishing a crisis intervention team program
